iframe-resizer
Examples   Pricing   GitHub        

IFRAME-RESIZER

Keep iframes sized to their content
Get Started View on GitHub

Automatic Resizing

Automatically works out the optimal strategy to calculate the page dimensions, every time your content changes size.

About iframe-resizer

Cross-Domain

Supports external (cross-origin) iframes via a simple JS file that is designed to be a zero impact guest on the sites hosting it.

Quick Start Guide

Extended API

Provides a range of missing browser API features, that allows you to securely integrate your iframe content with the parent page.

API Docs

Frameworks

Works with React, Vue, Angular and jQuery. Plus iframe-resizer provides an API for generating your own components.

Frameworks Guide

Wordpress

iframe-resizer is simple to setup and use with WordPress.

Wordpress Guide

Accessible

Automatically configures iframes to maximise accessibility compatibility and compliance.

Accessibility
